csts.​controllers.​Scans

This is the baseline controller for Scan type functions

Variables
Class Variables
controllerName

The name of the controller

viewModels

Middleware VewModels for the scans controller.

The Scans2Poam Applet

compareRarPoam

The compareRarPoam Applet

csts.​controllers.​Scans.​scans2poam

This is the scans2poam applet

See Also

csts.models.Scans.scans2poam

Variables
Applet Variables
scanFiles

the scan files that are being combined into the scans2poam report

scans

the findings from the various SCAP, ACAS and CKL scans

poamArr

The array of findings that will populate the poam and the rar

UI

Methods that interface directly with the User Interface

Functions
showIndex
showIndex()

This is the function called from the router to load the scans2poam module

Methods involved in the execution of the applet

Functions
execute

executes the scans2poam function

path
)

Grabs the files from the submitted path

Parameters

the path for the directory being scanned

getScanFiles(
path
)

This method will get file information for submitted files

Parameters

the path for the file being analyzed

These methods support the execution of the applet

csts.​controllers.​Scans.​compareRarPoam

Methods and variables related to the RAR/POAM comparison applet

See Also

csts.models.Scans.compareRarPoam

UI

Methods that interface directly with the User Interface

Functions
showIndex
showIndex()

This is the function called from the router to load the compareRAR/POAM functionality

Execution

Methods involved in the execution of the applet

Functions
executeComparison
executeComparison(
fields
)

This method executes the comparison between a RAR and a POAM by calling the appropriate method in the Scans model.

Parameters
fields

the fields that should be compared between the RAR and POAM

See Also

<csts.models.scans.compareRarPoam.compareWorkbooks>

Helper

These methods support the execution of the applet

Functions
moveField
moveField(
el
)

Handles moving data from the RAR to the POAM or vice versa

Parameters
el

The calling element

parseFiles
parseFiles()

This method loads the file information for the selected RAR and POAM for the comparison functions

@return {void}
